snippet.title: Morbius Gameplay Showcase | Marvel’s Midnight Suns
snippet.description:
To unleash Morbius' full potential, you'll need to make your enemies BLEED!

Learn how to maximize his Bloodlust in this deep dive video from Christopher Odd. The third DLC pack, The Hunger, is now available in Marvel’s Midnight Suns.

Launch your epic adventure with the legendary #MidnightSuns TODAY!

► Purchase the Legendary Edition to receive the Season Pass containing Morbius, Deadpool, Venom & Storm: https://2kgam.es/3TGGad6

► Watch the Prequel Shorts Intro Teaser: https://youtu.be/k9IPmCKu7qI
► Join the Official Marvel’s Midnight Suns Newsletter and get the exclusive Blade Nightstalker Skin: https://2kgam.es/Nightstalker
► Learn more about the Midnight Suns: https://2kgam.es/3Qdk2V1
-------------------------------------------------
